successes.title: PancakeBot - The world's first pancake printer!
successes.description: Don’t just make pancakes. Create them! Introducing PancakeBot - The coolest addition to your kitchen. * Patent Pending

Pledges.description: Thank you supporting the PancakeBot! Stay up to date with the latest developments.
Get your face made in the shape of a pancake. The photo of the pancake will be posted here as an update and can be sent to your email upon request.
PancakeBot - Super Early Bird: As a thank you for backing us early in the campaign, get the PancakeBot at 50% off retail (msrp $299)!
**SHIPPING FEE FOR BACKERS OUTSIDE OF THE US - Prior to shipping we will inform you of the shipping cost to your local market based on current rates.
PancakeBot - Early Bird: Get in early and save $130 off retail (msrp $299)!
**SHIPPING FEE FOR BACKERS OUTSIDE OF THE US - Prior to shipping we will inform you of the shipping cost to your local market based on current rates.
PancakeBot: Get the PancakeBot and save $120 off retail (msrp $299)!
**SHIPPING FEE FOR BACKERS OUTSIDE OF THE US - Prior to shipping we will inform you of the shipping cost to your local market based on current rates.
